Repeat: Purl 1 wrapping the yarn twice; k5; purl 1 wrapping the yarn twice; k1
Slip 1 wyib dropping the extra wrap; k5; slip 1 wyib dropping the extra wrap; k1
sl 1 wyif, p5, sl 1 wyif, p1
sl 1 wyib, k5, sl 1 wyib, k1
sl 1 wyif, p5, sl 1 wyif, p1

Drop the Color A slip stitch off the needle to the front of the work; k2; pick up the dropped stitch and knit it; k1, s1 2 wyib; drop the next Color A slip stitch off the needle, slip the same two stitches (the two you just slipped wyib) back to the left-hand needle, pick up the dropped stitch and knit it; k2, sl 1 wyib
p1, k1, p1, k2, sl 1 wyif, k2
p1 wrapping yarn twice, k1, p1 wrapping yarn twice, k5
Slip 1 wyib dropping the extra wrap; k1; slip 1 wyib dropping the extra wrap; k5
sl 1 wyif, p1, sl 1 wyif, p5
End Row: sl 1 wyif, p1, sl 1 wyif, p3

Repeat: sl 1 wyib, k1, sl 1 wyib, k5
End Row: sl 1 wyib, k1, sl 1 wyib, k3

Repeat: sl 1 wyif, p1, sl 1 wyif, p5
End Row: sl 1 wyif, p1, sl 1 wyif, p3

Repeat: sl 2 wyib; drop the next Color A slip stitch off the needle, slip the same two stitches (the two you just slipped wyib) back to the left-hand needle, pick up the dropped stitch and knit it.; k2, sl 1 wyib; drop next Color A slip stitch off needle, knit 2, then pick up the dropped stitch and knit it.; k1
p1, k2, sl 1 wyif, k2, p1, k1
